item.description:
Star Trek opens on Friday, May 8. The trailers look pretty cool, so let's see it on opening night! According to moviefone.com, there is a show at 6:30 PM, so let's meet in the Showcase lobby at 6:00. I will post a more accurate time on Thursday, May 7.

Since this is opening night, it will likely be busy. Please try to purchase your tickets in advance.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with glasses, goatee, and Superman cap

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Star Trek
